snippet.title: Lost Words
snippet.description:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LostWordsGame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LostWordsGame
Website: http://lostwordsgame.com/

Lost Words is a narrative adventure about a young girl aspiring to be a writer while facing a difficult issue in her real life. It's set between the pages of her diary and a fantasy land. The game features a story written by Rhianna Pratchett and ties the narrative into the gameplay in an unusual way, by having the player running on and interacting with the words in the diary to solve puzzles.
